Recon charges his energon blasters in each of his insectoid legs and fires 
eight shots from the six insectoid legs to aid Aerotaur in his fight against 
burning hammer.

>::Aerotaur::
>     He launches another arrow hitting and exploding the missile 
>prematurely.
>The blast knocks him back into the outside of the base.  "You'll regret
>that!"  Having dissipated the energon he returns to his robot mode and
>launches 16 medium strength blasts at BH. (8 from each arm so it's still
>legal).
